entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 32 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
